summary: Added potion effects as armor enchantments
descriptionHtml:
,.....................................________.............................................,
:_________________________Features______________________________:
1: Allows you to add any armor enchantment to any armor/Cloths parts.
(Boots, Gloves, Body Wear, Head Wear, & Shields, Amulets and Rings.

2: Adds New armor enchantments & enchanted items to the game.
(Spell Duration & Power, Items avalible at Lv20 and up)

3: New! armor enchant, Fortify Enchanting, the max % you can add is 32% bonus to
enchanting, it sucks but thats the way to game works i guess.

,....................................._________............................................,
:_________________________Side-Info______________________________:
1: Preset Duel Enchantments still have part restrictions.

2: Making Alchemy/Smithing 7 peice gears with all enchanting perks
will make potions with effects close to elixirs for alchemy,
smithing.

3: Having a MOD that adds 2nd equipable rings to the game will make
8 peice gears and will make potions as powerful as elixirs,
In terms of smithing, alchemy....Legendary is still hard(I hate Arrows).

4: Other potions that fortify skills like 1-handed, heavy armor, archery,
lockpicking, with 7/8 peice armor, will be around 100%.

5: About the Max enchanting bonus, with all the right enchanting
perks, it will come to 27%, equip the item and enchant another,
that should bring it up to 31%, its all you need, fortify
enchanting will go to 32% but that changes nothing for the
other enchanments.

6: new reachable Enchant %'s for skills like 1-handed, heavy armor,
archery, lockpicking, should be 52%, resistances between 50%-90%.

,....................................__________............................................,
:________________________Change-Log_____________________________:
Version 0.1
Added all armors & Cloths to Armor Enchantment Form Lists.
Added all WarAxes to the woodcutting Form list.
-
Version 0.5
Removed all WarAxes from Woodcuting form list(it didn't work).
-
Version 1.0
Added Shields to all armor enchantment form lists.
-
Version 1.1
copy & edit Alteration, Conjuration, destruction, Illusion, Restoration potion effects.
Made copyed potion effects work as armor enchantments with no duration.
added enchantments to Necro, warlock, master robes.
added enchantments to glass, elven, elven gilded, Stalhrim, daedric helms & chestplates.
added enchantments to Rings & amulets.
Added all items into leveled lists, and made them rarer, Lv20 Min needed for loot, shop.
Renamed items....
Alteration - Alterationalism.
Conjuration - The Conjuror.
Destruction - Power.
Illusion - Illusions.
Restoration - Restore.
Changed BASE Enchantments From 5 to 9.
-
Version 1.2
Renamed Enchantments & Magic Effects...
Fortify Alteration - Fortify Alteration Duration.
Fortify Conjuration - Fortify Conjuration Duration.
Fortify Destruction - Fortify Destruction Power.
Fortify Illusion - Fortify Illusion Power.
Fortify Restoration - Fortify Restoration Power.
Changed BASE Enchantments from 9 to 10.
-
Version 1.3
Created fortify enchanting armor enchant.
added to ring and amulet.
added items to leveled lists.
created a form list for adding enchantment to armor parts.
Lv30 Needed for loot and shop
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
._____________________________Installation______________________________________________.
Use NMM.

.__________________________My Other Mods_____________________________________________.

Ring Of Dragonborn (Most Popular Of My Mods, In All Ways).
-
Extra Tanning Rack Options
-
Extra Ingot Options for smelters
-
Breezehome Merchant - Talias Retreat
-
Riverwood hidden Mine
-
Master Sub-Difficulties

._____________________________Coming-Soon____________________________________________.
Sub-Races: Same race's, New Titles, Pre-Lived Experience.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
Skyrim Market Place: Find everything you need and more, for a price.(Part of another mod)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
Hunter's Mansion: A place to cook and fish, and more.(0% Lost in deletion, Remaking)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
The lost Temple:
A temple long lost, taken over by powerful creatures and Falmer Under the command of demons, and there is a portal....
+
SkyIsland:
An island in the sky, an angels Post to Protect skyrim from Demons, angel Weapons & Armor designs were past dawn to the elvens but not perfected as they were not forged in the Holy Forge, the only way there, is The Lost Temple.
Holy Magic, Weapons & Armors can be forged here, as long as you do not attack anything.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
Catacombs To Hell:
With Multible Diablo-Like dungeons, they are sealed away from Skyrims surface, Filled with traps and creatures that make these places Very Dangerous, deeper in the dungeons is a gate and a gate-guardien that seals the demons from getting out, past the gate are many powerful demons that would tear apart a mammoth like piranha, deeper down, past those demons, is Hell!, everything is on fire, smoldering rivers, and many more demons with Large Devil Lords, and an Evil Demi-God, Ruler Of Hell.
The daedra Have Learned a lot from Hells teachings, there armor and weapons seem the same, but fail! in comparison to there Strangth and effects, as the Daedric's were not forged in the Hell Forge.
Evil magic, Weapons & Armors can be forged here as long as nothing is trying to kill you.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
New World:
not the name of the mod but the idea, it will be as big as skyrim, if not bigger and better.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
Master Alchemist:
A master of alchemy, she knows secrets that will bring new potions and effects, she is a merchant with her own home and area.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
Master Of Magic:
She knows more powerful spells and can sell you about any spell needed, new magic.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
Boating:
Set off on a boat to find islands and reap the rewards, and fight pirates.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
More Levels, More Perks:
An idea to give each skill more then 100 levels, new skill caps 120 to 150, with new perks.
author: SkyMarin
